name: Remy Schultz
text: Alright so two times now I have ordered here because I really enjoy pizza...however, the first time my pizza was flavorless with very minimal sauce and white as if it had not even been inside an oven, and no garlic dipping sauce like …More

name: Colleen R
text: This pizza hut HAS a lot of potential. Had to give it at least one star for the sweet server Rose. Where to begin...first of all its not very clean. How can you have dirty restrooms and try to serve sanitary food?? I sure hope the new owner …More

name: Tracy Goetz Dvorak-Marshall
text: Well-run. Fast service. Clean. Organized. And of course, dependably tasty food.

name: Loren Bauman
text: I'd give zero stars if possible. Ordered medium pizza. Waited 30 minutes, no refills on our drinks, and turns out they hadn't even made our pizza yet.

name: Catina
text: Food okay. Service is horrible and slow. We got the privilege of listening to a manager yell, yes yell, at an employee for wearing the same dirty shirt for several days in a row.

name: Ylime A,zeferino
text: Good food for a quick snack

name: T Weaver
text: Just moved to Gunnison for school and over the semester I ordered from this pizza hut 3 times. Each time the pizza was awful. I like pizza hut and every other store I've been to has been good except this one. Each time the bottom of the …More

name: steve gottlieb
text: Service was very slow. 30 mins to get 3 orders of spigetti and meatballs, double order of bread sticks and 8 boneless wings. To top it off the spigetti was warm and the meatballs were cold. Not sure why it took so long, since there was only …More

name: Wenona French
text: Another Pizza Hut.  They are all pretty much the same.  Food was passable...service was passable.

name: Perry Dimmitt
text: Food is horrid and overpriced for the taste of card board

name: Dan and Taylor Coldiron
text: By far one of best pizza huts ever

text: Normally this would be a higher rating, but since the went Out of Business. Enough said, gave all the business to Dominos.

text: you can never go wrong with Pizza Hut

text: I wanted to hit the buffet after fishing.  Buffet hours 11:30 - 1:30.  Showed up at 1:25 and was told it was too late.  Losers!

text: Ordered delivery and it never came
